node.title: Unexplainable Ways
node.description: God works in ways far beyond our comprehension. In this study, Pastor Clark takes a closer look at the message of Romans chapter eleven, and how – amazingly enough – even the downfall of Israel was to be used by God for her eternal salvation. Has God been using unexpected, unexplainable ways to work for YOUR salvation? Might you be missing what He’s really doing in your life?
